EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners (1321459415.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners (1321459415.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE James,
You’re in the right spot. We actually work with hundreds of Booz Allen Consultants – be happy to guide you through the process and how we fit into the picture. Feel free to schedule a time convenient for you and we can chat. Here is my schedule: https://my.timedriver.com/C9CPC.
Steve
___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6011 f: 703.793.6081 m: 540.560.8837 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: James Yoon [mailto:james.yoon2@gmail.com] Sent: Wednesday, November 16, 2011 10:55 AM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: MBO Partners
Steve,
Thanks so much for your quick response! Sorry I didn't get off till 6:30 last night, I didn't want to call you back so late.
Just to give you a quick breakdown as to why I am contacting MBO:
I'm very interested in becoming an independant consultant, and I've been mulling it over for quite some time, however I'm not familiar with the process. I work full time for Booz Allen, and I have strong ties within my firm and other firms as well. I've supported large DoD clients my whole career.
So ultimately, my plan is to become an independant consultant and be brought back on by Booz as an external consultant. If you've helped others in this process, any kind of guidance would be greatly appreciated!
Thanks so much, James
On Tue, Nov 15, 2011 at 5:47 PM, Steve Arhancet <sarhancet@mbopartners.com> wrote: Dear James,
Thank you for your inquiry on our website. I’ll be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services or answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here: https://my.timedriver.com/C9CPC.
You can also watch a short video about who we are on YouTube: http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4.
I look forward to speaking with you,
Steve ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6011 f: 703.793.6081 m: 540.560.8837 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
